name: Chow Central Inc
long_description:
Chow Central is building virtual restaurant chains for Africa. 

We partner with under-utilised commercial kitchens to scale brands and serve customers with 10x lower costs than setting up traditional brick-and-mortar restaurants. We make $105K monthly revenue with 30% gross margins.

Our customers love our delicious recipes and they love our faster & cheaper deliveries. 

Wanna know our secret recipe? Contact: founders@500chow.com
one_liner: Asset Light Restaurant Chains for Africa
